item.title: Xbox Game Pass Adds Surprise Game With 'Overwhelmingly Positive' Reviews
item.description:
Highlights

  • Latest ID at Xbox showcase confirms 5 new games to Xbox Game Pass, offering a variety of titles for fans to enjoy today.
  • Microsoft continues to regularly add new games to Xbox Game Pass, ensuring fans of all genres have something to play.
  • The Rewinder, a game about altering the past, is joining Game Pass today, joining other great titles subscribers can explore.

Five more games have been confirmed for Xbox Game Pass as part of the latest ID at Xbox showcase, including one that can be played today. When it comes to new Xbox Game Pass games, fans are treated to a huge variety of titles. Some of the games that are added to Xbox Game Pass are massive, AAA games with blockbuster budgets, but other times, they are smaller-scale indie games.

Microsoft makes sure that there are constantly new games added to Xbox Game Pass on a regular basis , representing all types of games. This way, fans of basically any genre can find something they want to play through Game Pass.

Related
Xbox Game Pass New Games for May 2024 Wish List
There are currently just three games confirmed for Xbox Game Pass' May 2024 line-up, and there are plenty of titles fans would love to see this month.

As announced at the latest ID at Xbox event, Depersonalization , Firework , Keplerth: Another World , and Volcanco Princess are all coming to Xbox Game Pass. The games are expected to be available on Game Pass via PC, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S consoles. It's unclear when exactly Xbox Game Pass subscribers will get to play those four games, but they will have access to one surprise new Game Pass game, The Rewinder , at some point later today.

New Xbox Game Pass Games Coming Soon

Depersonalization - TBA

Firework - TBA

Keplerth: Another World - TBA

The Rewinder - Available now

Volcano Princess - TBA

The Rewinder is a game about a man who can "communicate with spirits and explore other people's memories to alter the past." The game was originally released on Steam in 2021 and has earned "Overwhelmingly Positive" reviews from Steam users. There are already a lot of great Xbox Game Pass games for subscribers to check out, and it seems The Rewinder is going to be added to that list.

The announcement of these five games joining Xbox Game Pass was just the tip of the iceberg when it came to the Game Pass announcements at the recent ID at Xbox showcase. Mega-popular Xbox Game Pass game Palworld also had a presence at the event, with four new Pals unveiled to the masses. Vampire Survivors , another popular Game Pass game, was also featured, with a surprise update now available to download. Needless to say, Xbox Game Pass subscribers have a lot to be excited about today.

item.title: Remedy Gives Updates on Max Payne Remakes and More of Its Upcoming Games
item.description:
Highlights

  • Remedy Entertainment expects the Max Payne 1+2 remake and Control 2 to enter the next stages of their development by Q2 2024.
  • Both the Max Payne remake and Control 2 are currently in pre-production stages, while the multiplayer Control spin-off Codename Condor is confirmed to be in full production.

Developer Remedy Entertainment has released a quarterly report detailing the expected development cycles for its previously announced Max Payne 1 + 2 remake, Control 2 , and Codename Condor . Both the Max Payne remake and the upcoming sequel for Control were first announced in 2022, and players now have a better idea of when these highly anticipated releases will enter the next stages of development.

Audiences have considered Max Payne and Max Payne 2 to be long overdue for remakes, with the smash hit titles originally released in 2001 and 2003, respectively. Control proved to be a major success for Remedy when it launched back in 2019, and fans have been eager for more of the classic Matrix -style gameplay of these two franchises.

Related
Remedy's Sam Lake Working With Hideo Kojima
Remedy Entertainment creative director Sam Lake and Hideo Kojima are working on a mysterious project together at Kojima Productions.

According to an investor report by Remedy, both the Max Payne 1+2 remake and Control 2 are in pre-production stages of development. Remedy explained that Max Payne 1+2 is currently in the "production readiness stage," which Control 2 is expected to enter sometime in Q2 of this year. The Control multiplayer spin-off game Codename Condor has been confirmed to be in full production, though a potential release window was not disclosed. Codename Condor is described as having a "unique Remedy angle" that complements the core gameplay loop. Control and Codename Condor both take place within the same universe as the Alan Wake franchise, and the success of Alan Wake 2 has been noted by Remedy as a major boost to the studio's development expenses.

Development Schedule For Upcoming Remedy Releases

The Max Payne 1+2 remake is slated to be a rebuilt version of the two titles combined into one brand-new release. The game has been sitting in a pre-production readiness state since October 2023, but Remedy has assured investors and fans that the project will be moving into full production by Q2 2024. Control 2 is still undergoing testing and adjustments for proof-of-concept, with the environment, mechanics, and graphics requiring final touches. Similar to Max Payne , Control 2 will enter its next development phase in Q2 2024. Remedy is currently also working on Codename Kestral , another multiplayer title, and DLC expansions for Alan Wake 2 .

Many fans have been eagerly awaiting more entries into the so-called Remedy Connected Universe of games . The connections between Alan Wake and Control have had audiences hopeful for even deeper dives into the expansive lore of these connected franchises and their shared in-game universe. With the iconic gameplay of the Max Payne remake and a stacked docket of "RCU" titles slated for development, fans of Remedy have plenty to look forward to in the coming years.

item.title: Rumor: An Original Avengers Actor Will Return In Secret Wars
item.description:
Highlights

  • Chris Evans is rumored to return as Captain America in Avengers: Secret Wars, sparking speculation and excitement among fans.
  • Avengers: Secret Wars is rumored to feature actors from Marvel movies predating the MCU, creating a multiverse connection.
  • Some fans are concerned that bringing back the original Avengers cast could diminish the impact of Endgame, while others are eager for their return.

The Avengers: Secret Wars cast may have added an actor from the original team's roster, one fans haven't seen since the Infinity War saga concluded with Endgame .

Avengers : Endgame followed the team as they traveled through time to retrieve the Infinity Stones (which Thanos destroyed after using them to decimate half of the population in the universe) hoping to use them to undo the Mad Titan's actions. Unfortunately, Scarlett Johansson's Black Widow sacrificed herself so the team could acquire the Soul Stone and Robert Downey Jr.'s Iron Man did the same when he used the stones to defeat Thanos and his army. After the team's victory, Chris Evans' Captain America traveled through time to return the Infinity Stone to the point they were taken during the team's high-stakes time heist, returning to the present as an old man after having remained in the past to live a life with Peggy Carter.

Related
Did Deadpool & Wolverine Find Inspiration From A Spider-Man Scene?
Fans eagerly await Deadpool & Wolverine's premiere, especially after a recent trailer hinted at a parallel to another Marvel classic, Spider-Man.

While these fates were intended to be farewells to the Avengers actors, fans have wondered if any of them will ever reprise their roles. MyTimeToShineHello now reports that Evans has already signed his contract to return in Avengers: Secret Wars . The scooper did not specify which role Evans will allegedly play in Avengers: Secret Wars , meaning fans can only speculate that it will be the original MCU Captain America or a variant. However, MyTimeToShineHello previously reported that Evans will cameo as the Human Torch in Deadpool and Wolverine , leaving room for speculation that the actor will reprise his Fantastic Four role in Avengers: Secret Wars instead.

Avengers: Secret Wars is rumored to include actors from Marvel movies that pre-date the MCU , including Hugh Jackman as Wolverine and Tobey Maguire as Spider-Man . As the conclusion to Marvel Studios' Multiverse Saga, the groundwork is being laid for actors from past Marvel movies to appear in the MCU, most notably with Deadpool and Wolverine , which features multiple performers from Fox's X-Men movies. So, it's not outside the realm of possibility for Evans to reprise his role as Captain America or Human Torch in Avengers: Secret Wars , especially considering the actor has expressed that he's more willing to return as his Fantastic Four character than the Star Spangled Man with a Plan .

However, not all fans are enthusiastic about the original Avengers cast returning to the MCU because they believe it would cheapen the impact of Endgame . While characters have returned from the dead on several occasions in the comics, more often than not, readers have consequently felt that significant comic book events such as deaths are immaterial because they can be undone so easily. The Marvel movies have largely avoided this problem. While the MCU could use the boost potentially provided by its most popular heroes after a string of box office disappointments, many fans believe bringing back Iron Man and others would be admitting defeat .

Of course, no former Avengers actor has been officially confirmed as an Avengers: Secret Wars cast member , including Evans. So, while some fans may argue that bringing back Iron Man, Captain America, and Black Widow is pandering, Marvel Studios may not have any intention of featuring these characters again.

Avengers: Secret Wars is scheduled to be released in theaters on May 7, 2027.

More
Deadpool & Wolverine: Can The MCU Give This X-Men Villain Another Chance?
X2 used Lady Deathstrike as a brainwashed henchwoman, but she'll be back for Deadpool & Wolverine. Could this lead to a more faithful take?

Source: MyTimeToShineHello/X

item.title: New Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Event is Huge for Shiny Hunters
item.description:
Highlights

  • Mass outbreaks in Pokemon Scarlet and Violet boost chances of finding shiny Pokemon like Magikarp, Varoom, Shinx, and Rellor.
  • DLC expansions like The Teal Mask and The Indigo Disk offer new Pokemon, locations, and story events for fans of the base games.
  • Pokemon Legends: Z-A and possible Generation 10 games are on the horizon, keeping players engaged in the Pokemon universe.

A new Pokemon Scarlet and Violet mass outbreak event makes it easier to catch shiny versions of specific Pokemon. Pokemon Scarlet and Violet mass outbreaks are when a large number of the same Pokemon all spawn in the same area. The increased spawn rate typically means that mass outbreaks make it slightly easier for Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players to catch shiny variants of Pokemon.

While the games had a rough launch, Pokemon Scarlet and Violet have dedicated fans who continue to play the open world games to this day. Those that have already conquered the base games' story and the new content added in the Pokemon Scarlet and Violet DLC expansions have started tackling some of the games' more daunting challenges, like completing their Pokedex or catching as many shiny Pokemon as possible .

Related
Pokemon Scarlet And Violet: 18 Rarest Pokemon
Pokemon Scarlet and Violet is chock-full of Pokemon for players to find. Here are the rarest ones in the game.

Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players who still have some shiny Pokemon to catch should be sure to boot up their games at some point between now and May 6 at 4:59pm PT. During this time, mass outbreaks of Magikarp and Varoom are happening in the Paldea region , while mass outbreaks of Shinx are popping up in the Kitakami DLC area. And finally, mass outbreaks of Rellor are happening in the Terarium at Blueberry Academy. While Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players are not guaranteed shiny encounters during these mass outbreaks, their odds of finding shiny variants of these Pokemon are definitely increased.

Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Current Mass Outbreaks

  • Until Monday, May 6 at 4:59pm PT
  • Paldea: Magikarp and Varoom
  • Kitakami: Shinx
  • Blueberry Academy: Rellor

For Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players to get the most out of these mass outbreaks, they need to purchase the DLC. The Teal Mask gives Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players access to Kitakami, while The Indigo Disk opens the door to the Blueberry Academy . Both expansions also give players access to some brand-new Pokemon, locations to explore, and story events to experience, so they're well worth it for fans of the base games.

New mass outbreaks and Tera Raid rotations will help keep Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players engaged with the games for now, but some may be anxious for Pokemon 's future. The next Pokemon game is Pokemon Legends: Z-A , which has been announced for a 2025 release on the Nintendo Switch. Game Freak has most likely started work on the Generation 10 Pokemon games as well, but they have yet to be announced.

item.title: Sea of Thieves Teases New Weapons and Items Coming in Season 12
item.description:
Highlights

  • Season 12 of Sea of Thieves introduces new weapons like the Double Barrel Pistol, offering more fighting options for players.
  • Additional content includes the Scattershot cannon ammo and Bone Caller throwable, bringing unique ways to attack enemies.
  • New clothing, ship items, and a Plunder Pass will further enhance customization for players.

A recently uploaded teaser for Season 12 of Sea of Thieves features some of the additional content that the upcoming major update will bring, including new weapons and items. The Unreal Engine 4-powered game, which is published by Microsoft and is part of the Xbox Game Pass subscription service, is set to become available on the PlayStation 5.

Releasing on April 30, Sea of Thieves ' Season 12 will deliver a host of fresh pirate-themed content for players of the title developed by Rare. A trailer for the update has just been unveiled, turning the spotlight on some of the next season's most prominent additions.

Related
What to Expect From Sea of Thieves on PS5
Rare's pirate adventure Sea of Thieves is finally sailing its way over to the PS5, so those who have yet to play it may wish to know what to expect.

A brief launch trailer for Season 12 of Sea of Thieves showed off the new Double Barrel Pistol in action. The weapon can unload two shots in quick succession or at the same time, giving users some flexibility when fighting. The Double Barrel Pistol has less range and damage compared to the regular Flintlock Pistol, which is considered to be one of the best weapons in Sea of Thieves .

Aside from weapons, the recent teaser for Sea of Thieves ' 12th season also highlighted the Scattershot cannon ammunition and the Bone Caller throwable. The Scattershot ammo breaks apart into four smaller cannonballs, potentially delivering multiple points of damage to ships in one shot at the cost of having far less range. Meanwhile, the Bone Caller summons skeletons that have a limited lifespan to fight for its user. As the Bone Caller can be fired from a cannon, it could prove to be incredibly useful during ship battles in Sea of Thieves , which often makes it to lists of the best games that feature ship combat .

Sea of Thieves Season 12 Release Date

  • April 30, 2024

For those interested in spicing up their pirate's wardrobe and style, Season 12 of Sea of Thieves will add new clothing, scars, and tattoos. It will also bring new flags, sails, figureheads, and cannons for ships. Player cosmetics and ship items are considered to be some of the best things for Sea of Thieves players to spend on , as they can make a character and their boat look unique.

Season 12 will arrive shortly after Rare revealed that Sea of Thieves has managed to attract 40 million players . In addition to providing fresh content, the upcoming update will introduce a new feature: the ability to traverse through harpoon lines. It will also have a new Plunder Pass, which is the paid battle pass for Sea of Thieves that provides players the opportunity to unlock even more rewards.
